transcript: most of the pain that people experience is purely in their own minds I think there's an interesting one between like burnout versus hard for me burnout is I would Define it as my output per unit of time decreases so I can see that that's measurable I can say like number of pages that I edit or the quality of the content that I create like my output per time like the team knows when I'm like 6 hours 7 hours into recording something they're like I literally start like slumping physically I just start like slumping like I'm just not as sharp right there's that versus emotional burnout which I think people mislabel as burnout when really it's just like they don't know how to reframe reality
